_header: Thy brother in heaven is master and king
Subjects: Christ, attributes of; sermons, verse in
_description: On the nearness of Christ, ‘þi felaw & þi grom’ — two couplets in a Latin sermon by Friar Nicolas Philip

BodLatTheD1.Transcription:
þat þi broþer in heuen is maister & kyngþi
                    suster is maister of all þinghe þat þat schal dem þe at
                    þe domhe is þi felaw & grom
